text: Delfia Cortez (Los Santos, January 21, 1963-Panama City January 10, 2024), was a Panamanian journalist and politician. Cortez was a correspondent for Telemetro Reporta in the province of Colón for many years. She worked at Acción 100% Noticias and Marbella Stereo 104.3FM. She was the mother of Víctor De Jesús Castillo. She died on January 10, 2024 at the age of 60, from a stroke. == References == Category:Panamanian politicians Category:1963 births Category:2024 deaths
title: Delfia Cortez
